properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 255 Unicode characters.

type.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 255 Unicode characters.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:.

type.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:.

properties.name: TransitGatewayId
properties.description: The ID of the transit gateway.

type.description: The ID of the transit gateway.

properties.name: PeerTransitGatewayId
properties.description: The ID of the peer transit gateway.

type.description: The ID of the peer transit gateway.

properties.name: PeerAccountId
properties.description: The ID of the peer account

type.description: The ID of the peer account

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags for the transit gateway peering attachment.

type.description: The tags for the transit gateway peering attachment.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the transit gateway peering attachment.

type.description: The status of the transit gateway peering attachment.

properties.name: State
properties.description: The state of the transit gateway peering attachment. Note that the initiating state has been deprecated.

type.description: The state of the transit gateway peering attachment. Note that the initiating state has been deprecated.

properties.name: CreationTime
properties.description: The time the transit gateway peering attachment was created.

type.description: The time the transit gateway peering attachment was created.

properties.name: TransitGatewayAttachmentId
properties.description: The ID of the transit gateway peering attachment.

type.description: The ID of the transit gateway peering attachment.
